category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_Product_Structure_Default_Actions
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default actions for a criteria executed in the CAE Manager's Inspector view on the simulation structure. The format for the default value is "Criteria::DefaultAction" where the valid values for the criteria are "Model With Different Product Revision Target", "Model With No Product" and "Extra Model Components". The valid values for Criteria "Model With Different Product Revision Target" are "Do Nothing", "Use New Model", "Use Model Related to Product Item", "Use Model Related to Product Revision", "Use Revised Model", "Replace Relationship" and "Add Relationship". The valid values for Criteria "Model With No Product" are "Do Nothing", "Add Relationship" and "Remove Model". The valid values for Criteria "Extra Model Components" are "Do Nothing" and "Remove Model". The default value for all the Criteria is "Do Nothing".
